SourceString: Welcome! I'm Luckland Island's owner,\nGolek's the name
I see. Seems you have {count} Mini Medals\non you right now.

If there's something in here you want, I will trade it for Mini Medals.
However, the blue-lettered items can only be exchanged once.
You'll need {required} Mini Medals for that\n{itemname},\nis that alright?
Now then, this {itemname}\nis yours from now on!
You don't have enough Mini Medals.\nNow then, is there anything else I can\noffer you?
Now then, is there anything else I can\noffer you?
Regrettably, you can't hold any more items.\nPlease organize your bag, and try again.
Would you like to exchange any more Mini Medals?
If you find any new Mini Medals and would\nlike to exchange them for treasure, you\ncan always talk to me.
Oh? Now, even if you own the equipment, you\ncan't equip it, do you still want to trade?<yesno><break>
